entry.title: [GRA2][Web hosting] software Upgrade
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 11, 21:00 - 22:00 UTC

Jul 11, 18:49 UTC
Scheduled - Start time :11/07/2022 21:00 UTC
End time :11/07/2022 22:00 UTC
Service impact : Access to FTP via net2ftp may be unavailable for a few minutes during migration. No impact on access to client sites, or to ftp from a regular ftp client.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we need to make adjustments to our infrastructure.

entry.title: [Global][VOIP] - Upgrading Yealink T53 - T53w phones firmwares
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 11, 20:00 UTC  -  Jul 12, 02:00 UTC

Jul 9, 00:28 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 11/07/2022 20:00 UTC
End time : 12/07/2022 02:00 UTC
Service impact : All phones will be rebooted after the firmware update.
Service improvement : In an effort to homogenise the customer park, we will be updating the firmware version of the Yealink T53 and T53w phones.

entry.title: [GRA][Webhosting] - Manager web statistics
entry.content:
Jul 11, 14:31 UTC
Resolved - Start Time :11/07/2022 07:00 UTC
End Time : 11/07/2022 14:20 UTC
Root cause : There was an issue with the load balancer to the metric read backend. The load balancer was switched to use a new read backend.

Jul 11, 14:08 UTC
Update - UPDATE: Our technical team have corrected the errors internally and on the API. Work still in progress to bring the service back in order.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

Jul 11, 09:00 UTC
Identified - Start time : 11/07/2022 07:00 UTC
Service impact : Access to web statistics on all hosted websites not available
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : GRA
Scope of impact : All on clusters
Our technical teams are working on resolving the issue. Updates will be post as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [GRA2][Webhosting] - Cluster 006
entry.content:
Jul 4, 09:35 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 27/04/2022 04:18 UTC
End Time : 04/07/2022 09:19 UTC
Comment : The data regeneration is complete.

Jun 27, 08:29 UTC
Update - 33% of the regeneration of statistics is completed.

Jun 20, 08:28 UTC
Update - The migration has been completed.
The regeneration of statistics has started.
We will post updates as soon as significant progress is made.

Jun 13, 09:40 UTC
Identified - The migration of the cluster is still in progress. We will come back to you when the migration is completed.

Jun 6, 08:55 UTC
Update - Update:Our teams are in the process of migrating the data to a different filerz which takes time.
That's why the regeneration of statistics is suspended.
We will come back to you when the migration is completed.

May 20, 08:37 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

May 20, 08:37 UTC
Update - Update : Our teams continue to work on resolving the generation of statistics.
We apologise for the inconvenience.

May 6, 15:21 UTC
Update - Update : We need to wait a few more weeks before restarting the generation and regeneration of statistics.

Apr 27, 14:30 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 27/04/2022 04:18 UTC
Service impact : Statistics are no longer generated from 27 April 2022
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : GRA2
Scope of impact : All offers on cluster006 are unavailable.
Ongoing actions : Due to unscheduled maintenance, we are unable to regenerate the statistics. We will restart this regeneration as soon as this maintenance is completed. Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [Global][Webhosting] - Slowness of SSL generation
entry.content:
Jun 23, 11:37 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 22/06/2022 08:34 UTC
End Time : 23/06/2022 11:30 UTC
Comment : The treatment of SSL tasks has returned to a normal level. The incident is closed.

Jun 22, 09:17 UTC
Identified - Start time : 22/06/2022 08:34 UTC
Service impact : Automatic SSL regenerations generate slowdowns in the treatment of new SSL installations.
Ongoing actions : Our teams have modified the treatment of renewals to make the slowdown as short as possible.
